verses.verse: And the high <S%G749><s%> priest <S%G749><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "Are these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> so <S%G3779><s%>?"

And he said, <S%G5346><s%> "Hear <S%G191><s%> me, brethren <S%G435><s%> <S%G80><s%> and fathers! <S%G3962><s%> The God <S%G2316><s%> of glory <S%G1391><s%> appeared <S%G3708><s%> to our father <S%G3962><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> when he was in Mesopotamia, <S%G3318><s%> before <S%G4250><s%> he lived <S%G2730><s%> in Haran, <S%G5488><s%>

and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, 'Depart <S%G1831><s%> from your country <S%G1093><s%> and your relatives, <S%G4772><s%> and come <S%G1204><s%> into the land <S%G1093><s%> that I will show <S%G1166><s%> you.'

"Then <S%G5119><s%> he departed <S%G1831><s%> from the land <S%G1093><s%> of the Chaldeans, <S%G5466><s%> and settled <S%G2730><s%> in Haran. <S%G5488><s%> And from there, <S%G2547><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> his father <S%G3962><s%> died, <S%G599><s%> [God] removed <S%G3351><s%> him into this <S%G3778><s%> country <S%G1093><s%> in which <S%G3739><s%> you are now <S%G3568><s%> living. <S%G2730><s%>

"And He gave <S%G1325><s%> him no <S%G3756><s%> inheritance <S%G2817><s%> in it, not even <S%G3761><s%> a foot <S%G4228><s%> of ground; <S%G968><s%> and [yet,] even when he had no <S%G3756><s%> child, <S%G5043><s%> He promised <S%G1861><s%> that He would give <S%G1325><s%> it to him as a possession, <S%G2697><s%> and to his offspring <S%G4690><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> him.

"But God <S%G2316><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> to this <S%G3779><s%> effect, <S%G3779><s%> that his offspring <S%G4690><s%> would be aliens <S%G3941><s%> in a foreign <S%G245><s%> land, <S%G1093><s%> and that they would be enslaved <S%G1402><s%> and mistreated <S%G2559><s%> for four <S%G5071><s%> hundred <S%G5071><s%> years. <S%G2094><s%>

"'And whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> nation <S%G1484><s%> to which <S%G3739><s%> they shall be in bondage <S%G1398><s%> I Myself <S%G1473><s%> will judge, <S%G2919><s%>' said <S%G3004><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> 'and after <S%G3326><s%> that they will come <S%G1831><s%> out and serve <S%G3000><s%> Me in this <S%G3778><s%> place. <S%G5117><s%>'

"And He gave <S%G1325><s%> him the covenant <S%G1242><s%> of circumcision; <S%G4061><s%> and so <S%G3779><s%> [Abraham] became <S%G1080><s%> the father <S%G1080><s%> of Isaac, <S%G2464><s%> and circumcised <S%G4059><s%> him on the eighth <S%G3590><s%> day; <S%G2250><s%> and Isaac <S%G2464><s%> [became the father of] Jacob, <S%G2384><s%> and Jacob <S%G2384><s%> [of] the twelve <S%G1427><s%> patriarchs. <S%G3966><s%>
"And the patriarchs <S%G3966><s%> became jealous <S%G2206><s%> of Joseph <S%G2501><s%> and sold <S%G591><s%> him into Egypt. <S%G125><s%> And [yet] God <S%G2316><s%> was with him,

and rescued <S%G1807><s%> him from all <S%G3956><s%> his afflictions, <S%G2347><s%> and granted <S%G1325><s%> him favor <S%G5485><s%> and wisdom <S%G4678><s%> in the sight <S%G1727><s%> of Pharaoh, <S%G5328><s%> king <S%G935><s%> of Egypt; <S%G125><s%> and he made <S%G2525><s%> him governor <S%G2233><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> Egypt <S%G125><s%> and all <S%G3650><s%> his household. <S%G3624><s%>

"Now <S%G1161><s%> a famine <S%G3042><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> Egypt <S%G125><s%> and Canaan, <S%G5477><s%> and great <S%G3173><s%> affliction <S%G2347><s%> [with it;] and our fathers <S%G3962><s%> could find <S%G2147><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> food. <S%G5527><s%>

"But when Jacob <S%G2384><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> that there was grain <S%G4619><s%> in Egypt, <S%G125><s%> he sent <S%G1821><s%> our fathers <S%G3962><s%> [there] the first <S%G4413><s%> time. <S%G4413><s%>

"And on the second <S%G1208><s%> [visit] Joseph <S%G2501><s%> made <S%G1107><s%> himself known <S%G1107><s%> to his brothers, <S%G80><s%> and Joseph's family <S%G1085><s%> was disclosed <S%G5318><s%> to Pharaoh. <S%G5328><s%>

"And Joseph <S%G2501><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> [word] and invited <S%G3333><s%> Jacob <S%G2384><s%> his father <S%G3962><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> his relatives <S%G4772><s%> to come to him, seventy-five persons <S%G5590><s%> [in all.]
"And Jacob <S%G2384><s%> went <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> to Egypt <S%G125><s%> and [there] passed <S%G5053><s%> away, <S%G5053><s%> he and our fathers. <S%G3962><s%>

"And [from there] they were removed <S%G3346><s%> to Shechem, <S%G4966><s%> and laid <S%G5087><s%> in the tomb <S%G3418><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> had purchased <S%G5608><s%> for a sum <S%G5092><s%> of money <S%G694><s%> from the sons <S%G5207><s%> of Hamor <S%G1697><s%> in Shechem. <S%G4966><s%>

"But as the time <S%G5550><s%> of the promise <S%G1860><s%> was approaching <S%G1448><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> had assured <S%G3670><s%> to Abraham, <S%G11><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> increased <S%G837><s%> and multiplied <S%G4129><s%> in Egypt, <S%G125><s%>

until <S%G891><s%> there arose <S%G450><s%> another <S%G2087><s%> king <S%G935><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> Egypt <S%G125><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> knew <S%G3609><s%> nothing <S%G3756><s%> about <S%G3609><s%> Joseph. <S%G2501><s%>

"It was he who took <S%G2686><s%> shrewd <S%G2686><s%> advantage <S%G2686><s%> of our race, <S%G1085><s%> and mistreated <S%G2559><s%> our fathers <S%G3962><s%> so that they would expose <S%G4160><s%> <S%G1570><s%> their infants <S%G1025><s%> and they would not survive. <S%G2225><s%>

"And it was at this <S%G3739><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> that Moses <S%G3475><s%> was born; <S%G1080><s%> and he was lovely <S%G791><s%> in the sight <S%G3588><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%> and he was nurtured <S%G397><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> months <S%G3376><s%> in his father's home. <S%G3624><s%>
"And after he had been exposed, <S%G1620><s%> Pharaoh's daughter <S%G2364><s%> took <S%G337><s%> him away, <S%G337><s%> and nurtured <S%G397><s%> him as her own <S%G1438><s%> son. <S%G5207><s%>

"And Moses <S%G3475><s%> was educated <S%G3811><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> the learning <S%G4678><s%> of the Egyptians, <S%G124><s%> and he was a man <S%G1415><s%> of power <S%G1415><s%> in words <S%G3056><s%> and deeds. <S%G2041><s%>

"But when <S%G5613><s%> he was approaching <S%G4137><s%> the age <S%G5550><s%> of forty, <S%G5066><s%> it entered <S%G305><s%> his mind <S%G2588><s%> to visit <S%G1980><s%> his brethren, <S%G80><s%> the sons <S%G5207><s%> of Israel. <S%G2274><s%>

"And when he saw <S%G3708><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> [of them] being treated <S%G91><s%> unjustly, <S%G91><s%> he defended <S%G292><s%> him and took <S%G4160><s%> vengeance <S%G1557><s%> for the oppressed <S%G2669><s%> by striking <S%G3960><s%> down <S%G3960><s%> the Egyptian. <S%G124><s%>

"And he supposed <S%G3543><s%> that his brethren <S%G80><s%> understood <S%G4920><s%> that God <S%G2316><s%> was granting <S%G1325><s%> them deliverance <S%G4991><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> him; but they did not understand. <S%G4920><s%>

"And on the following <S%G7075><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> he appeared <S%G3708><s%> to them as they were fighting <S%G3164><s%> together, <S%G3164><s%> and he tried to reconcile <S%G4871><s%> them in peace, <S%G1515><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> 'Men, <S%G435><s%> you are brethren, <S%G80><s%> why <S%G2443><s%> <S%G5101><s%> do you injure <S%G91><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another <S%G240><s%>?'

"But the one who was injuring <S%G91><s%> his neighbor <S%G4139><s%> pushed <S%G683><s%> him away, <S%G683><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> 'Who <S%G5101><s%> made <S%G2525><s%> you a ruler <S%G758><s%> and judge <S%G1348><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> us?
'You do not mean <S%G2309><s%> to kill <S%G337><s%> me as you killed <S%G337><s%> the Egyptian <S%G124><s%> yesterday, <S%G7088><s%> do you?'

"And at this <S%G3778><s%> remark <S%G3056><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> fled, <S%G5343><s%> and became <S%G1096><s%> an alien <S%G3941><s%> in the land <S%G1093><s%> of Midian, <S%G3099><s%> where <S%G3757><s%> he became <S%G1080><s%> the father <S%G1080><s%> of two <S%G1417><s%> sons. <S%G5207><s%>

"And after forty <S%G5065><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> had passed, <S%G4137><s%> an angel <S%G32><s%> appeared <S%G3708><s%> to him in the wilderness <S%G2048><s%> of Mount <S%G3735><s%> Sinai, <S%G4614><s%> in the flame <S%G5395><s%> of a burning <S%G4442><s%> thorn <S%G942><s%> bush. <S%G942><s%>

"And when Moses <S%G3475><s%> saw <S%G3708><s%> it, he [began] to marvel <S%G2296><s%> at the sight; <S%G3705><s%> and as he approached <S%G4334><s%> to look <S%G2657><s%> [more] closely, <S%G2657><s%> there came <S%G1096><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> of the Lord: <S%G2962><s%>

'I am the God <S%G2316><s%> of your fathers, <S%G3962><s%> the God <S%G2316><s%> of Abraham <S%G11><s%> and Isaac <S%G2464><s%> and Jacob. <S%G2384><s%>' And Moses <S%G3475><s%> shook <S%G1790><s%> with fear <S%G1790><s%> and would not venture <S%G5111><s%> to look. <S%G2657><s%>

"But the Lord <S%G2962><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, 'Take <S%G3089><s%> off <S%G3089><s%> the sandals <S%G5266><s%> from your feet, <S%G4228><s%> for the place <S%G5117><s%> on which <S%G3739><s%> you are standing <S%G2476><s%> is holy <S%G40><s%> ground. <S%G1093><s%>

'I have certainly <S%G3708><s%> seen <S%G3708><s%> the oppression <S%G2561><s%> of My people <S%G2992><s%> in Egypt, <S%G125><s%> and have heard <S%G191><s%> their groans, <S%G4726><s%> and I have come <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> to deliver <S%G1807><s%> them; come <S%G1204><s%> now, <S%G3568><s%> and I will send <S%G649><s%> you to Egypt. <S%G125><s%>'

"This <S%G3778><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> they disowned, <S%G720><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> 'Who <S%G5101><s%> made <S%G2525><s%> you a ruler <S%G758><s%> and a judge <S%G1348><s%>?' is the one <S%G3778><s%> whom <S%G3778><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> [to be] both <S%G2532><s%> a ruler <S%G758><s%> and a deliverer <S%G3086><s%> with the help <S%G5495><s%> of the angel <S%G32><s%> who appeared <S%G3708><s%> to him in the thorn <S%G942><s%> bush. <S%G942><s%>

"This <S%G3778><s%> man <S%G3778><s%> led <S%G1806><s%> them out, performing <S%G4160><s%> wonders <S%G5059><s%> and signs <S%G4592><s%> in the land <S%G1093><s%> of Egypt <S%G125><s%> and in the Red <S%G2063><s%> Sea <S%G2281><s%> and in the wilderness <S%G2048><s%> for forty <S%G5065><s%> years. <S%G2094><s%>

"This <S%G3778><s%> is the Moses <S%G3475><s%> who said <S%G3004><s%> to the sons <S%G5207><s%> of Israel, <S%G2274><s%> 'God <S%G2316><s%> shall raise <S%G450><s%> up for you a prophet <S%G4396><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> me from your brethren. <S%G80><s%>'

"This <S%G3778><s%> is the one who was in the congregation <S%G1577><s%> in the wilderness <S%G2048><s%> together <S%G3326><s%> with the angel <S%G32><s%> who was speaking <S%G2980><s%> to him on Mount <S%G3735><s%> Sinai, <S%G4614><s%> and [who was] with our fathers; <S%G3962><s%> and he received <S%G1209><s%> living <S%G2198><s%> oracles <S%G3051><s%> to pass <S%G1325><s%> on to you.

"And our fathers <S%G3962><s%> were unwilling <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2309><s%> to be obedient <S%G5255><s%> to him, but repudiated <S%G683><s%> him and in their hearts <S%G2588><s%> turned <S%G4762><s%> back <S%G4762><s%> to Egypt, <S%G125><s%>

saying <S%G3004><s%> to Aaron, 'Make <S%G2><s%> for us gods <S%G4160><s%> who <S%G2316><s%> will go <S%G3739><s%> before <S%G4313><s%> us; for this <S%G4313><s%> Moses <S%G3778><s%> who <S%G3475><s%> led <S%G3739><s%> us out of the land <S%G1806><s%> of Egypt <S%G1093><s%> – we do not know <S%G125><s%> what <S%G3609><s%> happened <S%G5101><s%> to him.'

"And at that time <S%G2250><s%> they made <S%G3447><s%> a calf <S%G3447><s%> and brought <S%G321><s%> a sacrifice <S%G2378><s%> to the idol, <S%G1497><s%> and were rejoicing <S%G2165><s%> in the works <S%G2041><s%> of their hands. <S%G5495><s%>

"But God <S%G2316><s%> turned <S%G4762><s%> away <S%G4762><s%> and delivered <S%G3860><s%> them up to serve <S%G3000><s%> the host <S%G4756><s%> of heaven; <S%G3772><s%> as it is written <S%G1125><s%> in the book <S%G976><s%> of the prophets, <S%G4396><s%> 'It was not to Me that you offered <S%G4374><s%> victims <S%G4968><s%> and sacrifices <S%G2378><s%> forty <S%G5065><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> in the wilderness, <S%G2048><s%> was it, O house <S%G3624><s%> of Israel <S%G2274><s%>?

'You also <S%G2532><s%> took <S%G353><s%> along the tabernacle <S%G4633><s%> of Moloch <S%G3434><s%> and the star <S%G798><s%> of the god <S%G2316><s%> Rompha, <S%G4501><s%> the images <S%G5179><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you made <S%G4160><s%> to worship <S%G4352><s%> them. I also <S%G2532><s%> will remove <S%G3351><s%> you beyond <S%G1900><s%> Babylon. <S%G897><s%>'

"Our fathers <S%G3962><s%> had <S%G1510><s%> the tabernacle <S%G4633><s%> of testimony <S%G3142><s%> in the wilderness, <S%G2048><s%> just <S%G2531><s%> as He who spoke <S%G2980><s%> to Moses <S%G3475><s%> directed <S%G1299><s%> [him] to make <S%G4160><s%> it according <S%G2596><s%> to the pattern <S%G5179><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he had seen. <S%G3708><s%>

"And having received <S%G1237><s%> it in their turn, <S%G1237><s%> our fathers <S%G3962><s%> brought <S%G1521><s%> it in with Joshua <S%G2424><s%> upon dispossessing <S%G2697><s%> the nations <S%G1484><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> drove <S%G1856><s%> out before <S%G575><s%> <S%G4383><s%> our fathers, <S%G3962><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> the time <S%G2250><s%> of David. <S%G7035><s%>

"And [David] found <S%G2147><s%> favor <S%G5485><s%> in God <S%G2316><s%>'s sight, <S%G1799><s%> and asked <S%G154><s%> that he might find <S%G2147><s%> a dwelling <S%G4638><s%> place <S%G4638><s%> for the God of Jacob. <S%G2384><s%>
"But it was Solomon <S%G4672><s%> who built <S%G3618><s%> a house <S%G3624><s%> for Him.

"However, <S%G235><s%> the Most <S%G5310><s%> High <S%G5310><s%> does not dwell <S%G2730><s%> in [houses] made <S%G5499><s%> by [human] hands; <S%G5499><s%> as the prophet <S%G4396><s%> says: <S%G3004><s%>

'Heaven <S%G3772><s%> is My throne, <S%G2362><s%> And earth <S%G1093><s%> is the footstool <S%G5286><s%> of My feet; <S%G4228><s%> What <S%G4169><s%> kind <S%G4169><s%> of house <S%G3624><s%> will you build <S%G3618><s%> for Me?' says <S%G3004><s%> the Lord; <S%G2962><s%> 'Or <S%G2228><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> is there for My repose <S%G2663><s%>?
'Was it not My hand <S%G5495><s%> which made <S%G4160><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%>?'

"You men who are stiff-necked and uncircumcised <S%G564><s%> in heart <S%G2588><s%> and ears <S%G3775><s%> are always <S%G104><s%> resisting <S%G496><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit; <S%G4151><s%> you are doing just <S%G5613><s%> as your fathers <S%G3962><s%> did.

"Which <S%G5101><s%> one <S%G5101><s%> of the prophets <S%G4396><s%> did your fathers <S%G3962><s%> not persecute <S%G1377><s%>? And they killed <S%G615><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who had previously <S%G4293><s%> announced <S%G4293><s%> the coming <S%G1660><s%> of the Righteous <S%G1342><s%> One, <S%G1342><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> betrayers <S%G4273><s%> and murderers <S%G5406><s%> you have now <S%G3568><s%> become; <S%G1096><s%>
you who <S%G3748><s%> received <S%G2983><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> as ordained <S%G1296><s%> by angels, <S%G32><s%> and [yet] did not keep <S%G5442><s%> it. "
Now <S%G1161><s%> when they heard <S%G191><s%> this, <S%G3778><s%> they were cut <S%G1282><s%> to the quick, <S%G2588><s%> and they [began] gnashing <S%G1031><s%> their teeth <S%G3599><s%> at him.

But being <S%G5225><s%> full <S%G4134><s%> of the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> he gazed <S%G816><s%> intently <S%G816><s%> into heaven <S%G3772><s%> and saw <S%G3708><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and Jesus <S%G2424><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> at the right <S%G1188><s%> hand <S%G1188><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%>
